title: Lowes Pickup Today Scraper
description: Scrape 'Pickup Today' inventory across 50+ Lowe's stores in WA/OR using massive parallelization

store_ids.title: Store IDs
store_ids.description: List of Lowe's Store IDs to scrape. Leave empty to scrape ALL 50+ WA/OR stores from LowesMap.txt.

categories.title: Category URLs
categories.description: Specific category URLs to scrape. Leave empty to use all 500+ categories from LowesMap.txt.

max_pages_per_category.title: Max Pages Per Category
max_pages_per_category.description: Maximum pagination pages per category (24 items/page). Set lower for faster runs.

use_stealth.title: Use Playwright Stealth
use_stealth.description: Enable playwright-stealth for anti-fingerprinting. RECOMMENDED: Keep enabled.

proxy_country.title: Proxy Country Code
proxy_country.description: Country code for residential proxies. Must be US for Lowe's.
